DOC.brief_title: Non-Inferiority Quantitative Transmission Ultrasound Case Collection Study
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective case collection study purpose collect case subsequent Reader Studies minimum two clinical site . Potential subject recruit group woman undergone diagnostic mammography demonstrate mammographic lesion least one view . Approximately 300 woman enrol . Subjects undergo QTUS follow diagnostic XRM mammographically-detected lesion ( ) least one mammographic view lesion see HHUS correspond XRM lesion ( ) . Potential Subjects eligible enrollment time correspond lesion identify HHUS . All subject undergo ultrasound guide aspiration/biopsy cytology determine whether lesion cyst solid . Each study site project collect approximately 75 cyst case 75 solid case total 150 case , stratify across four ( 4 ) recognize breast tissue density category least 50 % case subject heterogeneous extremely dense breast composition . The composition cyst case site project consist 25 simple cyst 50 complicate complex cyst total 75 cyst case . All enrolled subject undergo ultrasound guided aspiration biopsy surgical excision , applicable index lesion . Cytologic histologic result lesion perform collect .

( 180 kg ) Has concurrent disease condition judgment principal investigator disqualifies subject , participate study
